feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix the binding drawer for default values. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14676
  • Refresh data when adding columns by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14680
  • Budi 8664 cron helper ai feature by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14665
  • Add the ability to look up context by ID in automation thread by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14663
  • Implement GROUP BY for calculation views. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14678
  • Test all aggregation types. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14679
  • Update yarn.lock by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14688
  • Symbolise the special __bb_total count field name. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14685
  • Fix browser crash under certain circumstances with forms by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14689
  • Default values for options and array types (backend) by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14691
  • Adapt the payloads for a change in the feature branches deployment pipeline by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14690
  • Make sure calculation views are created and returned correctly from the API. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14681
  • Search tests from views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14687

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.10...2.32.11

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Backport V3 backend view change by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14673
  • Feature branch deployment job expects boolean as payload by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14696
  • More view calculation tests, and COUNT(DISTINCT ...) implementation. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14692
  • Pull the error object out of isolated-vm when a user script throws an error. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14693
  • Make the new throwing behaviour of processStringSync opt-in. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14705
  • persist app sort method selection by saving it against the user by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14703
  • Row action/set table permission by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14707
  • Add uiMetadata to viewV2 by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14700
  • Remove PAYLOAD_DEPLOY to enable invisible license rollouts by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14708
  • Changes relating to adding accountName to Account entity by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14712
  • JS backend deep clone optimisation. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14718
  • Validate that you cannot create a calculation view with more than 5 calculation fields. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14702
  • Fix enterprise vulns by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14724

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.11...2.32.12

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow calculation views to hide required fields. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14720
  • Fix SQS error handling. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14717
  • Validate that there are no duplicate calculations in calculation views. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14704
  • Mark calculation views explicitly instead of figuring it out implicitly. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14723
  • Remove unused properties by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14732
  • Test helper for setting feature flags. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14725
  • Allow empty queries when searching tables by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14738
  • Allow conditional search for users by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14741

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.12...2.32.13

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Handle internal relationships referencing rows that don't exist by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14695
  • Fix exporting internal rows by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14745

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.13...2.32.14

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Postgres - newlines between JSON aggregations by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14699
  • Move table creation to sdk by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14743
  • Ensure we only allow grouping by simple fields. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14733
  • Add a test to make sure 'shadowing' a field works as expected in calculation views. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14734
  • Make sure calculation views cannot be used to write or modify rows. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14735
  • Still fetch flags when the user is not logged in. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.14...2.32.15
